00136 #ifndef __TOMMYHASHLIN_H
00137 #define __TOMMYHASHLIN_H
00138 
00139 #include "tommyhash.h"
00140 
00141 /******************************************************************************/
00142 /* hashlin */
00143 
00148 #define TOMMY_HASHLIN_BIT 6
00149 
00154 typedef tommy_node tommy_hashlin_node;
00155 
00159 #define TOMMY_HASHLIN_BIT_MAX 32
00160 
00164 typedef struct tommy_hashlin_struct {
00165         tommy_hashlin_node** bucket[TOMMY_HASHLIN_BIT_MAX]; 
00166         unsigned bucket_bit; 
00167         unsigned bucket_max; 
00168         unsigned bucket_mask; 
00169         unsigned bucket_mac; 
00170         unsigned low_max; 
00171         unsigned low_mask; 
00172         unsigned split; 
00173         unsigned state; 
00174         unsigned count; 
00175 } tommy_hashlin;
00176 
00180 void tommy_hashlin_init(tommy_hashlin* hashlin);
00181 
00185 void tommy_hashlin_done(tommy_hashlin* hashlin);
00186 
00190 void tommy_hashlin_insert(tommy_hashlin* hashlin, tommy_hashlin_node* node, void* data, tommy_hash_t hash);
00191 
00204 void* tommy_hashlin_remove(tommy_hashlin* hashlin, tommy_compare_func* cmp, const void* cmp_arg, tommy_hash_t hash);
00205 
00214 tommy_hashlin_node* tommy_hashlin_bucket(tommy_hashlin* hashlin, tommy_hash_t hash);
00215 
00226 tommy_inline void* tommy_hashlin_search(tommy_hashlin* hashlin, tommy_compare_func* cmp, const void* cmp_arg, tommy_hash_t hash)
00227 {
00228         tommy_hashlin_node* i = tommy_hashlin_bucket(hashlin, hash);
00229         while (i) {
00230                 /* we first check if the hash matches, as in the same bucket we may have multiples hash values */
00231                 if (i->key == hash && cmp(cmp_arg, i->data) == 0)
00232                         return i->data;
00233                 i = i->next;
00234         }
00235         return 0;
00236 }
00237 
00243 void* tommy_hashlin_remove_existing(tommy_hashlin* hashlin, tommy_hashlin_node* node);
00244 
00248 tommy_inline unsigned tommy_hashlin_count(tommy_hashlin* hashlin)
00249 {
00250         return hashlin->count;
00251 }
00252 
00257 tommy_size_t tommy_hashlin_memory_usage(tommy_hashlin* hashlin);
